definition: to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth

sentences.english: Summer and winter and springtime and harvest.
sentences.chinese: 春夏秋冬四季，有栽種有收成。

sentences.english: with the year's coin for salt and taxes
sentences.chinese: 用於買鹽和交租的一年的收成。

sentences.english: We wish that we would have a good harvest this year.
sentences.chinese: 我們希望我們今年會有好收成。

sentences.english: The weather promises a good harvest.
sentences.chinese: 這天氣預兆着有好收成。

sentences.english: The crop that year was only one-third of the usual amount.
sentences.chinese: 那年的收成只是常年產量的三分之一。

sentences.english: He that soweth virtue shall reap fame.
sentences.chinese: 播下美好的品德，收成名望。

sentences.english: This year's crop is better than any other year's.
sentences.chinese: 今年的收成比以往哪一年都好。

sentences.english: Then the next year's crop and fleeces may repay you to the full.
sentences.chinese: 那麼盼望明年的收成和羊毛會全數給你作補償。

sentences.english: The husbandmen that laboreth must be the first to partake of the fruits.
sentences.chinese: 辛勤耕作的農夫應該首先享受所收成的。

sentences.english: Bycontrast, China's harvest is expected to yield 11.2 million hectoliters.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，中國的預計收成產量是1120萬公石。

sentences.english: Duration of Plum rainy season directly affects crop yield duo to many reasons.
sentences.chinese: 梅雨期長短直接關係農業收成，其成因有多說。

sentences.english: He had forgotten his farm and even lost the previous year's harvest.
sentences.chinese: 他完全置農場於不顧，甚至頭一年的收成也損失掉了。

sentences.english: It's that true, this is visit are very importance, we got a lot of harvest.
sentences.chinese: 嗣魅真地，此次拜候十分有意義，十分有收成。

sentences.english: In this regard, Zubkov predicted that this year's grain harvest will be quite good.
sentences.chinese: 對此，祖布科夫預測說，今年的糧食收成將相當不錯。

sentences.english: The farmers didn't know whether they would have a good harvest .
sentences.chinese: 農民們不知道他們是否會有一個好收成。

sentences.english: Other Internet bigcos mostly had good years, but without any major breakthroughs.
sentences.chinese: 其他網絡公司也都收成不錯，但沒什麼重大突破。
